summary: Magical armour, looks the same as \'Steel Plate\'
descriptionHtml:
I always liked the look of Steel Plate armor, I think it looks pretty bad ass, Anyway, As I always play a magical, or mage role in skyrim, Or most of the TES games, I couldn\'t use the awesome armor, as It was heavy, I\'ve created this file to fix this, and for all other mages, So that you can look awesome, AND be a good spell caster, I\'ve set the enchants similiar to the best mage gear you can get, (Arch-Mage robes enchant on the Steel Plate Breastplate, Ect.)

I called it \'Mythril Armor\' as I think the name fits, As Mythril in many games is considered a magical metal.

This is my first mod :p - I might consider re-texturing it later, and when I find out how to.

This armour in-game is located in the \'Hall of the Elements\' In the collage of winterhold, On the floor.
author: Chompsterox
